game.name: The Outlast Trials
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Red Barrels invites you to experience mind-numbing terror, this time with friends. Whether you go through the trials alone or in teams, if you survive long enough and complete the therapy, Murkoff will happily let you leave… but will you be the same?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Red Barrels invites you to experience mind-numbing terror, this time with friends. Whether you go through the trials alone or in teams, if you survive long enough and complete the therapy, Murkoff will happily let you leave… but will you be the same?

reviewHighlights.text: best chess and arm wrestling game with a survival horror minigame attached to it
This game includes naked women. naked men, naked, gore, tweakers from ny on the streets that you can throw bricks at.
